players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. We should keep a close eye on each other and make sure no one else meets an untimely end."
Bob: remained silent.
You: "I agree with Charlie's sentiment about keeping a close eye on each other. It's important that we work together to ensure everyone's safety in this game."

You: "I'd like to propose that we form an alliance to keep each other safe and work together as a team. With Diana out of the game, it's more important than ever that we stick together and trust one another."

Charlie: "I think it's important that we all share any information we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. By working together and communicating openly, we can increase the chances of identifying the mafia and keeping everyone safe in the game."

Bob: "I agree with Charlie's suggestion about sharing information. In light of the recent events, it's crucial that we all work together and keep each other informed to increase our chances of identifying the mafia and ensuring everyone's safety in the game."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
